title: Should you bet on new-age tech stocks in a rising interest rate regime?s - Business Standard
content: Should you bet on new-age tech stocks in a rising interest rate regime?s  Business Standard
description: After a lull, a rebound in the market has lifted new-age technology stocks off their lows in the last one month. Is the magic returning to new-age tech stocks or it's a short-term euphoric overshoot?
